name: css-border-style
description: Css module of single purpose classes for border style

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-border-style.css > css/css-border-style.css && tachyons src/css-border-style.css --minify > css/css-border-style.min.css && tachyons src/css-border-style.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
